page.title: 15CARE OF THE AGED IN WIDNES
page.content: In the Ditton area of Widnes there are two Old People's Residential Homes. Children from{St Michael's}went along to interview the old people. {Nazareth House}is run by a Religious Order.It is set in it's own grounds attached to {ST Michael's Church}and looks after approx.100 old people. Bridget Whelan is the oldest lady there.She went to{St Marie's School. and is 100.She has 48 grandchildren,98 great grandchildren and 44 great great grandchildren.She has a son in his seventies,who used to look after her until three years ago and visits her every day.The {Queen}sent Bridget a telegram when she was 100. { Ethel Hanley House}is run by Halton Council and is named after a former Mayoress.It takes care of 8 day care and 43 residential people.It is in the middle of a council estate.
